TopicTitle: Planetary Disc -With Gaps- Is Imaged Around HL Tauri

Articles.Content:
The star HL Tauri is no more than a million years old, and a planetary disc has been discovered by the Hubble telescope. Not until early November ago has it been imaged sharper than ever, with GAPS. This means that planets are forming. And the star's a million years old. I'll let you soak that in.

Link to Sci-News.com's article on it: www.sci-news.com/astronomy/science-alma-planet-formation-young-star-hl-tauri-02259.html
